if dataframe.empty:
        raise ValueError("Empty input DataFrame.")
    if dataframe.dtypes.isin(['float64', 'int64']).all():
        raise ValueError("Non-numeric column found.")
    if len(dataframe.columns) < 2:
        raise ValueError("Input DataFrame has fewer than two columns.")

    corr = dataframe.corr()
    idx, val = corr.unstack().idxmin()
    x, y = idx.split('_')

    ax = dataframe.plot.scatter(x=x, y=y, c="k")
    ax.set(title="Scatter Plot of Correlated Columns")

    return ax

if dataframe.empty:
        raise ValueError("Dataframe cannot be empty.")

    for col in dataframe.columns:
        if dataframe[col].dtype not in [np.float32, np.float64]:
            raise TypeError("Column {} has non-numeric data type.".format(col))

    if len(dataframe.columns) < 2:
        raise ValueError("Dataframe has too few columns for correlation calculation.")

    corr = dataframe.corr()
    df_sorted = corr.sort_values(by=abs(corr), ascending=False)

    plt.scatter(x=df_sorted.index[0], y=df_sorted.index[1], s=20)
    ax = plt.gca()
    ax.set_xlim(left=0, right=1.5)
    ax.set_ylim(bottom=0, top=1.5)
    ax.set_title("Scatterplot of the columns with highest absolute correlation")
    return
